author: Erica Werner
title: Congressional Democrats allege Trump’s move to defund World Health Organization is illegal
description: Democratic lawmakers say President Trump does not have authority to unilaterally withhold spending from the World Health Organization, with House Speaker Nancy Pelosi calling his move illegal.
content:
This decision is dangerous, illegal and will be swiftly challenged, Pelosi said.
Pelosis comments came a day after Trump declared he would be suspending payments to the WHO in response to the United Nations agencys handling of the coronavirus pandemic. Trump… [+5483 chars]
